question: What is the median age of passengers flying to Asian destinations?
query:
SELECT percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY age) AS median_age
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT p.passenger_id, p.age
  FROM postgres_air.passenger p
  JOIN postgres_air.boarding_pass bp ON p.passenger_id = bp.passenger_id
  JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON bp.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
  JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
  JOIN postgres_air.airport a ON f.arrival_airport = a.airport_code
  WHERE a.continent = 'AS' AND p.age IS NOT NULL
) AS sub;
